string.text: Our cache is in the tunnel. Everything is in a pipe. It's secure, very few people know about the place, and anomalies keep stalkers away.
Seryi's cache.
In a stump hidden near the tunnel. There is a convenient hole.
Inside stump.
Under the cross, buried near a bush there are possessions.
Stash under a grave cross.
Took off his rucksack under a fallen tree.
Rucksack is under a tree.
Rucksack stuffed into a pipe near the factory. No one will find it.
Rucksack of a chimney sweep.
Box on the roof of the factory where no one can see it. Will be ruined by the weather.
Box on the roof.
They were shooting at us so we had to throw the rucksack under a car behind a wheel. I'll get it later.
Rucksack of Alkie.
Hid under the cross by the cisterns. Dig a bit, just do not get carried away.
Three cisterns.
At the factory a rucksack on top, so that from the bottom it cannot be seen. Only now I cannot remember the exact location.
Rucksack in a window.
Inside the factory,we put our things in a box.
Radioactive box.
Under the stairs in a box is some stash.
Box near stairs.
In a drawer hidden, no one will check for it there.
Factory box.
Threw the bag out the window, then pick it up.
Bag through window.
Kolyan and I had a nice walk in Agroprom. We found a lot of stuff, and managed to hide a few things. We put a box into a trash container.
Trash container.
Under a fallen tree I found a safe. I guess I will hide some stuff there.
Safe under a tree.
I threw some stuff into a pipe. I'll get this stuff later. I had to leave this stuff there. I had to much to carry. Hope this stuff will not get wet.
Things in a pipe.
Solme stuff is in an old pipe. We'll have to tell the guys. I'm not climbing in there, it's radioactive.
Radioactive pipe.
Ran away from the base dodging the bullets of stalkers shooting at me. Put my stuff into a pipe. I'll hide here somewhere and get my stuff later.
Pipe
There is a half buried safe near a bush. That's where I hid everything.
Safe near a bush.
Box found under a support beam. Someone carried it all the way from the scientific research institute. Let's wait for the helicopter, then we'll take it away.
Archive box.
There is a rumore that the grunts keep some extra stuff down in the sewer exit near the base.
Under the hatch.
Under a bush is a half buried safe where I put my stuff.
Near a bush outside a wall.
Convenient box where the soldiers put stuff.
Institute case.
In a safe in the military barricks there should be some weapons and amoo. Do not get get is now.
Agroprom safe.
I put some stuff in a pipe that I put up later.
Back of a truck.
Take things out of the rotten log.
Rotten log.
There is a box in Agroprom Institute. Once upon a time it kept the institute farm implements. I wonder what is there now.
Quartermaster Box.
A nice box for small items, like I had at home for my metalworking tools.
Inventory Box.
The bandits are hiding something under a pipe. Got to check it out. From a conversation it is clear that there is some stash there belonging to the Bandit group.
Bandits' communal stash.
Put the bag under pieces of concrete and go light. Would rather be hungry, but at least alive.
Rucksack in the alley.
Box is hidden near a rusty barrel in the underground. No way am I going to go back there near those pipes. Bloodsuckers! What a miracle that I killed that bloodsucker. I do not remember much.
Box of a bloodsucker.
Behind the wall is loot. I could market that stuff.
Stalker's stuff.
I hid some of my valuables. A tricky place for my stash. A yellow barrel. No one will find it.
Noah the mole.
Hid the rucksack near the base of 'Duty.' I'll pick it up some time later when it is safer.
Hidden rucksack.
I was chased a large pack of dogs. If I hadn't dropped my rucksack then I would not have reached the gates.
Abandoned rucksack.
All that remained was buried under a cross.
Hiding place under a cross.
Took off his rucksack here, so will be easier.
Rucksack
'Duty' has stored ammo in the bunker, and no one is guarding it.
Supplies in the bunker.
Dolgovtsev saw something stuck in a pipe near the gates.
Possible stash.
It all belonged to him, let it stay here for now.
Hiding place under a cross.
I went to the Bar, and left the rucksack in the hangar.
Rucksack
It is said that 'Duty' has something valuable near an electric switch panel.
Cache near electric
At the top of the tower near 'Duty' I placed a box. I doubt anyone will notice it.
Cache on a tower.
Hidden in a pipe under stairs.
Cache under stairs.
Not far from the Bar passed some anomalies is some goods in a safe. No one will know how to open it. But it's simple, just pry the door and it will open.
Arnie's stash.
Not far from the Bar is some buried goods.
Cache
Near the Bar in the box.
Box
In a nook hidden near the Bar is a box.
Box
Buried beneath a cross behind some pine trees.
Cache
Under a cross near the passage to Dark Territory.
Cache
In a pipe near the Arena is a box with some antirad.
Box
Under a tower in a pipe is hidden some gear.
Cache
Under a cross is a cache.
Cache
I hid some possessions in a train car while the guards went back to the base. I can always come back later when they are again not here.
Train boxcar on a bridge.
I saw, near a railway tunnel in the woods, a dead stalker killed by the anomaly there. Some of his stuff was better then average.
Possessions of a dead stalker.
Near the bandit camp under a cross I hid some loot.
Cross near the bandit camp.
Knowledge of a box taken by some bandits and hidden in the cellar of the central building has been uncovered. You have to prepare a squad and get it.
Bandit's warehouse.
When we were lads and wore uniforms we fought off some dogs. I buried a few goodies under a cross. I'll let it stay there for now.
Under a cross.
I hid a rucksack in the attic. I'll be back later some time.
Rucksack in the attic.
At the farm was found a floor safe. I'll just leave it there.
Safe at a farm.
A heard a rumor that somebody hid something in a train car on the bridge. Will need to check it out on the way back. I wonder who could have done that.
Container in a train car
Put the goods under a roof in a small house near the bridge.
Possessions of a stalker.
Gear hid in one of the boxes near the bridge. Everything tied. Am leaving the zone, so good-bye lads! I'll always remember the motherland!
Things near the bridge.
Not far from the rookie camp a stalker perished. Someone should check his stuff.
Rucksack near a village.
The bandits didn't get our other box of supplies. It's still in an attic in the rookie village.
Attic in a village.
Found a good hiding place in the attic. I think I will wait until someone puts something there, and then swipe it.
Convenient location.
I heard from Vorpala that some guys found a stash in an attic. A reconnaissance group was in that area and spotted it. Let's go check into this.
Vorpala's stash.
They say the commander has a clever box in his office, and that his valuables are in it.
The commander's valuables.
Not far from the rookie camp a stalker died. Let's see what he was carrying. Who here misses this guy?
Near a rural road.
In an attic some bandits hid some loot. When they are not around let's go steal it all.
Bandits's attic.
Equipment found in a pipe near the farm. When it's not guarded I will definitely go back.
Gas pipe.
Threw my rucksack off not far from the post. I should pick it up as soon as possible before the commander transfers us to a new location.
Hidden things.
On the tower I temporarily left a box. I'll pick up when I can.
Tower at a checkpoint.
I saw how a bandit hid his possessions in a box in a hangar. How can I steal it?
Bandits' cache.
We went to see Vasya some guy, then Vasya was shot. I had nothing to do with it. Some fool did it. I hid our stuff in the pipe.
The old crane.
In the Garbage near a railway tunnel where a diesel engine is there was a grizzly sight of a dead stalker. What a pity.
Grizzly sight
Stored some things in a pipe in the Garbage.
Pipe in the north heap.
Some stuff in a pipe in Landfill. If you do not know exactly where, you would never find it.
Stash in some scrap metal.
Some stuff in a metal pipe near the two cisterns. Ought to be gotten, but there is no time.
Iron pots near the cisterns.
Among the radioactive waste, where few people would go, are hidden some useful things.
Pipe in the eastern pile.
In a valley is someone's rucksack near some anomalies. How could anyone get to it?
A rucksack.
We found the body of an informer in the swamp. His possessions were left under the cross.
Murdered stalker's possessions.
In a stump a secret stash. A good place to hide something.
Rotten stump.
In the forest there is a log with a hole in it. There is a treasure in it. Let's get it now.
A log in the forest.

Petrenko reported that there is information about a cache of Arrow's group in Garbage. Here in the valley should be a hatch. He told us that it could be tricky to open. When the area is calm must go get it.
Arrow's group's warehouse.
Hidden in a car, Long said, a good place.
Stash in a car.
A bus has a rucksack in it that is well hidden.
Stalker's rucksack on a bus.
Supplies in a box which is in a strange building around the corner. I still do not understand what the structure is for.
Supplies strange building.
There is a safe partially buried in a pile of crap. Must be some stuff in it. Better not forget where it is.
Safe in the southern pile.
Goodies in a pipe in a pile of scrap metal.
Cache in scrap metal.
The commander ordered a retreat on the radio. I came across a box and put my stuff in it so I could travel lightly.
Supplies in a box.
Supplies stuck in a pipe in the Garbage. I wonder how long its been there.
Pipe near the bus.
In the ruins is a well hidden rucksack. I hope I can find it before the bandits do.
Rucksack in the ruins.
Dolgovtsev said to get the supplies stashed in a trailer. We must somehow go pick it up. And to say thank you Duty.
Supply box at a Duty checkpoint.
They say in Garbage Dohlyaka has some supplies. It is necessary go and check it out. Otherwise someone else might get it.
Dohlyaka's rucksack.
In a hatch there are some goodies.
Avoska (string bag) in a hatch.
Near the excavator someone perished in an anomaly. A rucksack can be seen, but it's hard to get to it.
Under the excavator.
Barely slipped under beams, a well hidden rucksack. No one would climb in there.
Stash under the concrete blocks.
Hidden goodies in a log. I think it won't be found.
Hiding place in a log.
In the oven is stashed some odds and ends.
Hiding place in an oven.
In the cabin of a KAMAZ (truck) are hidden odds and ends.
Stash in a KAMAZ.
Under a cross near a village are some goodies.
Goodies under a cross.
I threw my gear in a pipe. I'll pick it up later.
Hiding place in a pipe.
Cache box hidden in a water tower.
Cache near a tower.
In the oven stuffed a rucksack, will come in handy some day.
Oven stash.
Loot hidden in a car in an abandoned village.
Automobile secret.
In the ruins with radiation is an abandoned rucksack. Most will be afraid to go there.
A dangerous secret.
Buried the loot under a cross which is in a secluded place.
A stalker's stash.
Hid the rucksack with equipment in a secluded place.
Rucksack with equipment.
Hid my possessions in a car on a hill.
Hiding place on a hill.
Helicopter crashed near an abandoned military base. The box is close by and right under the helicopter. One problem, anomalies and radiation all around.
Box near the helicopter.
On a hill beneath a cross is some buried loot.
Secret near a grave cross.
In a stump is a hiding place, a good place too.
Secret stump.
Left a rucksack in the cockpit of a crane. Get it later.
Crane cache.
Everything put into a box in the train car near the base. We agreed to leave it there.
Agreed hiding place.
Shoved the goods into a log. I think it won't be found.
Treasure in a log.
Supplies stuck in a tube on the lake.
Pipe with supplies.
In an iron capsule outside the Freedom base are some little things.
Stalker's stash.
Put the goods into a log. I don't think they'll find them.
Goods in a log.
Convenient box to keep some stuff in.
Convenient box.
In the tunnel hid the rucksack with supplies.
Rucksack in the tunnel.
Nice box to store supplies.
Box with supplies.
Put goods in the log. Shouldn't be found.
Hiding place in a log.
In the case are some supplies. Will get it some other time.
Temporary cache.
In a hatch buried things that will come in handy someday.
Steel cache.
In a case put some goods. Save for later.
Box with supplies.
Supplies hidden in a car right under Freedom's nose. There was no time to look for a better place.
Stash in the car.
They say that a well known stalker vanished here. No one retrieved his stuff yet.
Dead stalker's supplies.
In a garage, it's believed, is a box with a ton of supplies.
Treasure in a garage.
In the kindergarten building is supposedly a box with supplies.
Old cache.
Fang made a stash in Pripyat near a monument. All of his loot is there. I suppose we shouldn't take from the dead.
Fang's stash.

The last thing that was known about him was that he survived the 'Scorcher'. He left all his supplies in an old supermarket and continue to travel. Supposedly everything went as planned. He was the best leader that 'Freedom' ever had.
'Freedom' leader's supplies.
There is a cross on the way to the 'Burner'. He left everything he had under it.
Seryi's treasure.
Here died a stalker and his goods are still lying around, and no one can get them.
Dead stalker's goods.
They say the forest has a half buried safe somewhere. And that is has supplies in it.
Goods in a safe.

They were told not to fly over the 'Scorcher', and that's exactly what they did. They went down hard in the middle of a forest. It is unlikely anyone survived. Somewhere out there lies something that was being transfered.
Stuff for 'Duty'.

They say that there was a group of stalkers that made their way to the Zone's center, just before the radiation affects of the 'Scorcher'. None of them returned. Their supplies are still there, and therefore up for grabs.
Supplies of the reckless.
They say that the leader of some former faction died here and that he had valuable supplies with him.
Supplies of a faction leader.
Rucksack stashed behind the iron plate.
Hidden rucksack.
Stashed supplices under a cross.
Hiding place under a cross.
Hid something in a box under the house. Shouldn't forget.
Box under the house.
I was putting a rucksack under some stairs and then these bastards showed up and took it. Damn, how would I get it?
Stalker's rucksack.
There's a half buried safe in the corner behind a tree. That's where all my possessions are for the time being.
Hiding place behind a tree.
All that is captured during a raid was hidden in a box a garage.
Stash in a garage.
A box of stuff is hidden away behind a booth.
Hidden box.
Put a rucksack in a hole. Unlikely it will be seen from up here.
Rucksack stash.
Box stashed away in a secluded place.
Box in a safe place.
Under a roof is my rucksack. It's there for one of those rainy days.
Stalker stash.
They say this house has a safe and there is something hidden away it in.
Safe in a house.
Hid in a pipe in a house. Beware, there are weird things going on there.
Hiding place in a pipe.
What is agreed to, take it from the box now. there is Usually no one ever look in it.
Hidden box.
Under a cross in a back alley.
Stash in back alley
Excess supplies hidden at a construction site under some concrete.
Stash under concrete.
In case we need to leave quickly we'll place supplies into a box at the construction site.
Cache of Lucky.
At the construction site buried in a back alley.
Stash.
Stuffed everything into a kind of pipe. I'll will pick it up later.
Hiding place in a pipe.
Not far from the construction site is a hideen box with drugs.
Medicine chest.
Dragged the box into the crane cab.
Box in the crane.
When I was traveling through Wild Territory I overheard two mercenaries talking. They mentioned placing some supplies into a hatch.
Cache in a hatch.
Reached for an artifact near an anomaly, and now I can barely walk. Rucksack was pulled off of me and I had to leave it.
Abandoned rucksack.
Under the roof of a tower I left box of stuff. No one should notice it.
Box under a roof.
We put what we found in a pipe not far from the construction site.
Hiding place in a pipe.
Put the goods in a log. I think no one will find it.
Hiding place.
Left the rucksack near a crane.
Rucksack.
Hid some supplies under a cross on a mountain.
Hiding place under a cross.
Placed some goods into a log. Don't think anyone will see the stuff.
Hiding place in a log.
Rucksack stuffed under the bridge. Leave is lie for now.
Rucksack under the bridge.
Put a box in the car near the swamp.
Cache in a car.
In a stump is a hiding place. And a good place at that.
Cache in a tree stump.
On the farm an excellent box of supplies was found. The loners here must use it.
Box with supplies.
Into a pipe I threw my gear. I'll check on it later.
Hiding place in the pipe.
Put a rucksack under a tree.
Hiding place under a tree.
Some n00b stole the chest from the bandits. He put it into an overturned Niva. He says that by the looks of it, it's a government chest. We'll have to arm our guys and go take a look at it.
Government box.
Thieves are all over this place. And they even steal from each other. But they will never find my stuff.
Box
In the bandit's hatch are things that will come in handy someday.
Bandit's stash in a hatch.
I threw my bag under a tree, otherwise I would not have gotten away from the bandits.
Stalker's rucksack.
I put some odds and ends put into a pipe. Should be there whenever I need it.
Cache
Everything I stole from Borov I hid away in a safe under a pine tree. I have to wait until they stop looking for it before I return to get it.
Hidden safe.
The temporary headquarters are in a train car, and so is a chest with a supplies.
Supplies in a train car.
Barely got into a pipe under the road. At least I will now be able to hide my rucksack.
Secret place in a pipe.
Someone stored food in a box at the factory, and wow what a feast we could have!
Box with goods.
I'm hiding the supplies behind a pipe. It's hard to get to it, but at least they won't find it to easily.
Cache next to a pipe.
Found some cartridges in an electrical control room.
Hiding place in the electrical control room.
There is a box in the factory. I wonder what is in it.
Secret cache box.
Rookie hid his new rucksack and cannot remember where it hid it.
Hidden rucksack.
A box was left in a van. Someone should fetch it.
Forgotten Box.
Found safe at a gas station. He hid it well. Then again, hardly anyone goes there.
Safe at the gas station.
A box was dragged to a cistern.
Box
Put the supplies in a safe at a gas station.
Safe at the gas station.
In the camp of the bandits in a car is a box. We must quietly check on it. I sense there is something there.
Box in a car.
Put the box into the secret stash. It's a safe place.
Box in the secret stash.
He left a rucksack in an abandoned building. No one was around.
Abandoned rucksack.
We'll store the goods in a safe place. If the soldiers don't come today, then they might be here tomorrow. They won't look around for very long, so the valuable stuff will be for me.
Borov's secret cache.
Placed a rucksack near a building.
Rucksack in a secret place.
Placed the loot an inconspicuous box. I'll worry about it later.
Inconspicuous box.
Hid the rucksack under a car. No on should find it there.
Hidden rucksack.
Supplies hidden in a car nearby some bandits. There was not enough time to look for a better place.
Stash in a car.
Rumours say some stalker stored his supplies in the laboratory in an electrical control panel in the elevator shaft. And now he can't get to it.
Supplies in an electrical panel.
Another rumor says a stalker got into the laboratory and took all the supplies from the electrical panel.
Scout's rucksack.
In the underground laboratory there are supplies in a safe. No one has the keys into the laboratory. Stones and other junk fly all over the place for no apparent reason. Really strange.
Smoked cache.
Hd to chuck me rucksack to save me ass.
Abandoned rucksack.
Under a cross on a hill there is a stash.
Hiding place under a cross.
They say there's a half buried safe on a small piece of land in the swamp. Need to get more information about it.
An old safe.
Stuck the stash into a pipe by the camp.
Pipe with some goods.
Stash in a garage is full of stuff.
Rucksack in garage.
Rucksack stashed in a box right behind the iron junk.
Rucksack near iron.
Places a box in a bus and it shouldn't be noticed.
Cache in a bus.
Loot hidden in a car in an area where the radiation is not very strong.
Loot in a car.
They say there loot there, but the radiation is real bad.
Old rucksack.
They say a group of stalkers hid made a stash in a radioactive area.
Cache belonging to group of stalkers

Another volunteer died. Another prototype outfit did not protect him from the radiation. He was able to only reach the middle area and fell there and died. Sakharov wanted to make more accurate measurements, but I will not go. Then I'll be dead too.
Rucksack of a researcher.
They say there is someone's loot there, but it cannot be gotten due to radiation.
Old cache.

It is necessary to turn these guys down. Sugars and Kruglov are complete psychos. They request that I go with another stalker into the center of the radiation. Well, they are nutz. As soon as I gather the stash in the hatch I am out of the freak'n place.
Cache of a scientist.
Putting a stash in a log, I think would be found.
Treasure in a log.
They say that someone put a cache here, but it is protected by radiation.
Box with the goods.
Information about a cache.
